Docs.summary: Degrees relative to true north.
Docs.value: 0..360 in degrees relative to true north. null if unavailable.

remarks.para: Requires a high accuracy query of location and may not be returned by Geolocation.GetLastKnownLocationAsync

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether this location has a reduced accuracy reading.
Docs.value: True if the accuracy is reduced, false if the accuracy is not reduced.
Docs.remarks: This functionality only applies to iOS. On other platforms this will always be false.
